United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 01-2127

                     ELIE N. KARAK ET AL.,

                     Plaintiffs, Appellants,

                               v.

                    BURSAW OIL CORP. ET AL.,

                     Defendants, Appellees.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on May 2, 2002 is corrected
as follows:

     On page 2, line 4, replace "defendant" with "plaintiff"
